evidence.claim: Universal Health Corporation utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing solutions.
The company supports FHIR standards for interoperability with various EHR systems.
Universal Health Corporation implements HL7 messaging protocols for seamless health data exchange.
They have a detailed approach to handling X12 EDI transactions for billing and insurance communications.
The use of Google Cloud for data analytics is documented for health data management.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 for healthcare transactions alongside API automation.
